posts.name: smolBBS
posts.text:
You have installed smolBBS. 
 Set your config.php settings if you haven't yet!

Be sure to set the file permissions for "users.json" and "board.json" to 777. 

 User IP addresses are encrypted as their ID on users.json and on their posts in board.json. Use this to ban/unban users.

Any questions about smolBBS should be asked on #dulm in Rizon IRC.
